message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. I'm willing to let you inspect the product before buying, and I'll even give you a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, I'll refund your money and we can start fresh. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love this product.

Plus, I'm willing to throw in a free accessory that complements the product perfectly.
